creator: kimono.outfit.am@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 34784
patch for messages_ja.properties

Current Japanese translation of match_num_field, "0で乱数" is mistranslated.
It does means "from 0 to random number".

I correct it and add new translations of below.
･validate_threadgroup
･menu_zoom_in
･menu_zoom_out
･run_threadgroup
･run_threadgroup_no_timers
･menu_logger_level
･menu_logger_panel
･start_no_timers

creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Thanks for your contribution. It will be included in version 3.2.
